name: Secret Oparetion
description:
The content of this game is our side's spy investigating the creation of the enemy army's cyborgs. But our spy was caught. Our mission is to help the spies and destroy the enemy cyborgs.

(Thx for Asset/Pic)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to Play

Moving - W A S D

Sprint - LShift

Fire - Mouse 0 

Reload  - R (Warning! when you Reload you can't move.)
